DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective preliminary study compare Tennant BioModulator Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) Traditional Chinese Acupuncture management chronic pain among injured service member . The secondary objective investigate associative effect benefit sleep , Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) symptom , depression .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Acupuncture , BioModulator , Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation Symptomatic Treatment Chronic Pain .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must Injured service member age 18 60 , inclusive ; The pain must present 3 month great prior entry study ; Subjects must agree follow medication regime direct pain clinic provider duration study ; Subjects must able speak read English understand study procedure Epilepsy Pregnancy , consider pregnancy within study timeframe Pacemaker History cardiac arrhythmia Implantable device ( AICD , pump , etc . ) Surgical intervention past month treatment low back pain underlying etiology Documented history prescription medication abuse Abuse illicit drug within last 6 month Participation clinical trial investigational drug and/or agent within 30 day prior screen
